front.title: Inter-AS Option B between NVO3 and BGP/MPLS IP VPN network

abstract.t: This draft describes the solution of inter-as option-B connection between NVO3 network and MPLS/IP VPN network. The ASBR located in NVO3 network is called ASBR-d, the control plane and data plane procedures at ASBR-d are specified in this document, they are different from traditional option-B ASBR defined in [RFC 4364].
